messages.content: Only Amanda Hopgood can beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate here in Durham.
Amanda Hopgood is the only candidate capable of beating Corbyn's Labour here.
The Conservatives are out of the election race in Durham. Their education cuts, NHS failure, and local Lib Dem vote surge puts them a poor third.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Amanda will stand up against Conservative cuts to Education.
Amanda will challenge the Conservatives on NHS budgets.
Amanda will challenge the Tories on their extreme Brexit plans which risk jobs and funding.
Amanda has a record of fighting to protect our public services and will continue to do this within the government.

mentions.candidate: Amanda Hopgood is the only LOCAL choice at the General Election. Born in Durham, worked here all her life, with a record of fighting for local people.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour are in utter chaos, completely failing in opposition and falling behind the Lib Dems in the local vote.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives are out of the election race in Durham. Their education cuts, NHS failure, and local Lib Dem vote surge puts them a poor third.

issues.brexitEurope: Amanda will challenge the Tories on their extreme Brexit plans which risk jobs, funding, or freedoms for everyone in our area.
issues.education: Amanda will stand up against Conservative cuts to Education and NHS budgets.
issues.health: Amanda has a record of fighting to protect our public services and will continue to do this within the government.
issues.socialWelfare: Amanda has a record of fighting to protect our public services and will continue to do this within the government.

leaflet.personalStatement: Amanda Hopgood is the only LOCAL choice at the General Election. Born in Durham, worked here all her life, with a record of fighting for local people.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of the Lib Dem group on Durham County Council
politicalExperience.achievements: Her track record fighting Conservative education cuts and NHS cuts.

quotes.text: Theresa May indicates she'll scrap pension triple-lock
Corbyn to order Labour MPs to vote for Article 50.

images.caption: Hard-working LOCAL Lib Dem Amanda Hopgood is the only one to beat Labour here on June 8th.

examples: On May 4th, Amanda Hopgood's Lib Dems soared ahead of Labour in Durham.
Their education cuts, NHS failure, and local Lib Dem vote surge puts them a poor third.
Amanda has a record of fighting to protect our public services.
Amanda will challenge the Tories on their extreme Brexit plans.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour are in utter chaos.
Amanda, your hard-left candidate or Local Lib Dem Amanda Hopgood.
Born in Durham, worked here all her life, with a record of fighting for local people.
